column4: how do I generate an xorg.conf file? I deleted it and ubuntu hasn't made anew one

try zacstone_:  k, not the commands, after Alt+ Ctrl+F1 and login,  type sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop and then type   sudo  dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and then after configuring type   sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start
